label: Azure OpenAI
name: azureOpenAI
description: Wrapper around Azure OpenAI large language models

options.label: Get Ether Balance for a Single Address
options.name: getEtherBalance
options.description: Returns the Ether balance of a given address.

options.label: Get Ether Balance for Multiple Addresses(separated by a comma)
options.name: getEtherBalanceMulti
options.description: Returns the Ether balance of the addresses(each address separated by a comma) entered.

options.label: Get transactions
options.name: getTransactions
options.description: Returns the list of transactions performed by an address, with optional pagination.

options.label: Get internal transactions
options.name: getInternalTransactions
options.description: Returns the list of internal transactions performed by an address, with optional pagination.

options.label: Get internal transactions by hash
options.name: getInternalTransactionsByHash
options.description: Returns the list of internal transactions performed within a transaction.

options.label: Get internal transactions by block
options.name: getInternalTransactionsByBlock
options.description: Returns the list of internal transactions performed within a block range, with optional pagination.

options.label: Get Contract ABI
options.name: getAbi
options.description: Returns the contract Application Binary Interface (ABI) of a verified smart contract.

options.label: Get Contract Source Code
options.name: getContractSourceCode
options.description: Returns the Solidity source code of a verified smart contract.

options.label: Check Transaction Receipt Status
options.name: getTransactionReceiptStatus
options.description: Returns the status code of a transaction execution.

options.label: Check Contract Execution Status
options.name: getContractExecutionStatus
options.description: Returns the status code of a contract execution.

options.label: Get ERC20 Token Supply
options.name: getErc20TokenSupply
options.description:
Returns the total supply of an ERC-20 token. The result is returned in the token's smallest decimal representation.
                        Eg. a token with a balance of 215.241526476136819398 and 18 decimal places will be returned as 215241526476136819398

options.label: Get ERC20 Token Balance
options.name: getErc20TokenBalance
options.description:
Returns the current balance of an ERC-20 token of an address. The result is returned in the token's smallest decimal representation.
                        Eg. a token with a balance of 215.241526476136819398 and 18 decimal places will be returned as 215241526476136819398

options.label: Get ETHER Price
options.name: getEtherPrice
options.description: Returns the latest price of 1 ETHER.

options.label: Get Total Supply of Ether
options.name: getEtherSupply
options.description: Returns the current amount of Ether in circulation.

inputParameters.label: Address
inputParameters.name: address
inputParameters.description: The address parameter(s) required

inputParameters.label: Start Block
inputParameters.name: startBlock
inputParameters.description: the block number to start searching for transactions

inputParameters.label: End Block
inputParameters.name: endBlock
inputParameters.description: the block number to stop searching for transactions

inputParameters.label: Page
inputParameters.name: page
inputParameters.description: the page number, if pagination is enabled

inputParameters.label: Offset
inputParameters.name: offset
inputParameters.description: the number of transactions displayed per page

inputParameters.label: Transaction Hash
inputParameters.name: txhash
inputParameters.description: the string representing the transaction hash to check for internal transactions

inputParameters.label: Contract Address
inputParameters.name: contractAddress
inputParameters.description: the contract address of the ERC-20 token

label: Zapier API Trigger
name: ZapierAPITrigger
description: Start workflow based on Zapier API events

inputParameters.label: Webhook URL
inputParameters.name: webhookUrl
inputParameters.description: Webhook URL for the channel. Learn how to get: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K8vgRWZnSZw

inputParameters.label: Content
inputParameters.description: Message contents (up to 2000 characters)
inputParameters.name: content

inputParameters.label: Username
inputParameters.name: username
inputParameters.description: Override the default username of the webhook

inputParameters.label: Avatar URL
inputParameters.name: avatarUrl
inputParameters.description: Override the default avatar of the webhook

inputParameters.label: TTS
inputParameters.name: tts
inputParameters.description: Send as Text To Speech message

label: Send Email
name: emailSend
description: Send email to single or multiple recipients

inputParameters.label: From Email
inputParameters.name: fromEmail
inputParameters.description: Email address of the sender.

inputParameters.label: To Email
inputParameters.name: toEmail
inputParameters.description: Email address of the recipient. Multiple emails can be comma-separated.

inputParameters.label: CC Email
inputParameters.name: ccEmail
inputParameters.description: Email address of CC recipient. Multiple emails can be comma-separated.

inputParameters.label: Subject
inputParameters.name: subject
inputParameters.description: Subject line of the email.

inputParameters.label: Body - Plain Text
inputParameters.name: text
inputParameters.description: Plain text message of email.

inputParameters.label: Body - HTML
inputParameters.name: html
inputParameters.description: HTML text message of email.

inputParameters.label: Ignore SSL
inputParameters.name: ignoreSSL
inputParameters.description: Send email regardless of SSL validation.

options.label: Get Ether Balance for a Single Address
options.name: getEtherBalance
options.description: Returns the Ether balance of a given address.

options.label: Get Ether Balance for Multiple Addresses(separated by a comma)
options.name: getEtherBalanceMulti
options.description: Returns the Ether balance of the addresses(each address separated by a comma) entered.

options.label: Get transactions
options.name: getTransactions
options.description: Returns the list of transactions performed by an address, with optional pagination.

options.label: Get internal transactions
options.name: getInternalTransactions
options.description: Returns the list of internal transactions performed by an address, with optional pagination.

options.label: Get internal transactions by hash
options.name: getInternalTransactionsByHash
options.description: Returns the list of internal transactions performed within a transaction.

options.label: Get internal transactions by block
options.name: getInternalTransactionsByBlock
options.description: Returns the list of internal transactions performed within a block range, with optional pagination.

options.label: Get list of Blocks Validated by Address
options.name: getBlocksValidated
options.description: Returns the list of blocks validated by an address.

options.label: Get Contract ABI
options.name: getAbi
options.description: Returns the contract Application Binary Interface ( ABI ) of a verified smart contract.

options.label: Get Contract Source Code
options.name: getContractSourceCode
options.description: Returns the Solidity source code of a verified smart contract.

options.label: Check Transaction Receipt Status
options.name: getTransactionReceiptStatus
options.description: Returns the status code of a transaction execution.

options.label: Get ERC20 Token Supply
options.name: getErc20TokenSupply
options.description:
Returns the total supply of a ERC-20 token. The result is returned in the token's smallest decimal representation.
                        Eg. a token with a balance of 215.241526476136819398 and 18 decimal places will be returned as 215241526476136819398

options.label: Get ERC20 Token Balance
options.name: getErc20TokenBalance
options.description:
Returns the current balance of a ERC-20 token of an address. The result is returned in the token's smallest decimal representation.
                        Eg. a token with a balance of 215.241526476136819398 and 18 decimal places will be returned as 215241526476136819398

options.label: Get Historical ERC-20 Token TotalSupply by ContractAddress & BlockNo [PRO]
options.name: getHistoricalErc20TokenSupply
options.description:
Returns the historical amount of a ERC-20 token in circulation at a certain block height. The result is returned in the token's smallest decimal representation.
                        Eg. a token with a balance of 215.241526476136819398 and 18 decimal places will be returned as 215241526476136819398

options.label: Get Historical ERC-20 Token Account Balance by ContractAddress & BlockNo [PRO]
options.name: getHistoricalErc20TokenBalance
options.description:
Returns the balance of a ERC-20 token of an address at a certain block height. The result is returned in the token's smallest decimal representation.
                        Eg. a token with a balance of 215.241526476136819398 and 18 decimal places will be returned as 215241526476136819398

options.label: Get Token Info [PRO]
options.name: getTokenInfo
options.description: Returns project information and social media links of an ERC-20/ERC-721 token.

options.label: Get ETHER Price
options.name: getEtherPrice
options.description: Returns the latest price of 1 ETHER.

options.label: Get Historical ETHER Price [PRO]
options.name: getHistoricalEtherPrice
options.description: Returns the historical price of ETHER.

label: OpenAI
name: openAI
description: ChatGPT, image generation or text completion from prompt via OpenAI API

actions.label: Operation
actions.name: operation
actions.description: Select the type of operation you want to perform

options.label: Generate Text Completion via text prompt
options.name: textCompletion

credentials.label: Credential Method
credentials.name: credentialMethod
credentials.description: Use the api key provided by OpenAi

inputParameters.label: Model
inputParameters.name: model
inputParameters.description: AI model to use.

inputParameters.label: Model
inputParameters.name: model
inputParameters.description: ChatGPT model to use.

inputParameters.label: Text Prompt
inputParameters.name: prompt
inputParameters.placeholder: Write me a 250 words essay on fish
inputParameters.description: The prompt for chatpgt

inputParameters.label: Text Prompt
inputParameters.name: prompt
inputParameters.description: The prompt to generate completions for

inputParameters.label: Image Description
inputParameters.name: prompt
inputParameters.placeholder: Photograph of an astronaut riding a horse
inputParameters.description: Description of the image you want to generated. The maximum length is 1000 characters.

inputParameters.label: Image Number
inputParameters.name: imageNumber
inputParameters.description: The number of images to generate. Must be between 1 and 10.

inputParameters.label: Image Size
inputParameters.name: imageSize
inputParameters.description: The size of the generated images.

inputParameters.label: Response Format
inputParameters.name: response_format
inputParameters.description: The format in which the generated images are returned.

label: Webhook
name: webhook
description: Start workflow when webhook is called

inputParameters.label: HTTP Method
inputParameters.name: httpMethod
inputParameters.description: The HTTP method to listen to.

inputParameters.label: Authorization
inputParameters.name: authorization

options.label: API
options.name: headerAuth
options.description: Webhook header must contains "X-API-KEY" with matching key

inputParameters.description: The way to authorize incoming webhook.

inputParameters.label: API key
inputParameters.name: apiKey
inputParameters.description: Incoming call must consists header "x-api-key" with matching API key. You can create new key from the dashboard

inputParameters.label: Response Code
inputParameters.name: responseCode
inputParameters.description: The HTTP response code to return when a HTTP request is made to this endpoint URL. Valid range: 1XX - 5XX

inputParameters.label: What/How to Return
inputParameters.name: returnType

options.label: Immediate Reponse
options.name: immediateResponse
options.description: Returns response immediately once webhook is called

options.label: When Last Node Finishes
options.name: lastNodeResponse
options.description: Returns output response of the last executed node

inputParameters.description: What data or message, and how should Webhook node return upon successful calling

inputParameters.label: Response Data
inputParameters.name: responseData
inputParameters.description: Custom response data to return when a HTTP request is made to this webhook endpoint URL. If not provided, default to: Webhook received!

label: OpenAI Embeddings
name: openAIEmbeddings
description: Generate embeddings for a given text using OpenAI API

inputParameters.label: Model
inputParameters.name: model
inputParameters.description: The OpenAI model to use for generating embeddings.

inputParameters.label: Text
inputParameters.name: text
inputParameters.placeholder: Enter the text to generate embeddings for
inputParameters.description: The input text for generating embeddings.

inputParameters.label: Strip New Lines
inputParameters.name: stripNewLines
inputParameters.description: Whether to strip new lines from the input text.

inputParameters.label: Batch Size
inputParameters.name: batchSize
inputParameters.description: The batch size for generating embeddings.

inputParameters.label: Timeout
inputParameters.name: timeout
inputParameters.description: The timeout for the API call.

inputParameters.label: Base Path
inputParameters.name: basepath
inputParameters.description: The base path for the OpenAI API.
